title: Why my PC/laptop can not detect the S7?
answer:
1.You should install the driver which can be downloaded from (http://www.huaweidevice.com/tcpsdownload/downLoadCenter?category=&flay=software&fileName=100816033143.zip&attachmentName=usbdriver.rar).
